reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects and processes personal data, indicating a clear declaration of data collection.
reply.reference: The personal data of the users that are collected and processed through... Share™ Mobile Application URL: https://www.theshareco.org/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects the following types of data: First and last name, Email address, Mobile Number, Country/province/state, IP address, Payment information, Any additional information provided directly or indirectly, Cookies.

content: Any additional information provided directly or indirectly

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the information provided in the 'Types of Information Gathered' section of the privacy policy.
reply.reference: The app collects the following information: First and last name, Email address, Mobile Number, Country/province/state, IP address, Payment information, Any additional information relating to you that you provide to us directly through our websites or indirectly through our websites or online presence such as ‘cookies’. URL: https://www.theshareco.org/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use within the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the various purposes for which data is collected and used by the app.
reply.reference: Improve our services, website, and how we operate our business. Understand and enhance your experience using our website and services. Send emails through bulk email delivery platforms such as MailChimp and Klaviyo. Respond to your comments or questions through our support team (Chat and email). Send you related information, including confirmations, invoices, technical notices, updates, security alerts and support and administrative messages. Communicate with you about upcoming events and news about services offered by Share and our selected partners. Marketing purposes of Share. Link or combine your information with other information we get from third parties to help understand your needs and provide you with better service. Protect, investigate and deter against fraudulent, unauthorized or illegal activity. URL: https://www.theshareco.org/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions sharing customer information with third-party service providers and outlines the types of functions they perform. This indicates that the app shares data with third parties.
reply.reference: Information about our customers is an important part of our business...Third-Party Service Providers. We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf.... They have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes. URL: https://www.theshareco.org/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third-party service providers such as Stripe for processing payments and sending emails.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares data with third-party service providers like Stripe for specific functions such as processing payments and sending emails. This indicates a clear sharing of data with Stripe.
reply.reference: Third-Party Service Providers. We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. Examples include process payments (Stripe), sending email... They have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes. URL: https://www.theshareco.org/privacy
